original: @195a / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: gar skad du

original: a'arya pra t'i tya sa muta p'a ra da n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
analyzed: aarya pra t tya sa muta pa ra da na ma ma ha ya na su tra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: phag ba rten cing brel ba byung ba zhes byed ba theg ba chen po mdo

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad la phyag tshal lo

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na

original: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang na /
analyzed: joms ldan da sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha nang na

original: aar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang; lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /
analyzed: aar mo ni ga lta bu rdo leb la rta thul la sogs ba nyan thos chen po rnams dang phag ba byams ba dang phag ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang; lag na rdo rje la sogs ba byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen po yon tan rin po che dpog tu med ba rgyan ba rnams dang

original: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ba chen po dang sred med kyi bu dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs ba lha rnams dang lha dbang po brgya byin dang dri za rgyal po gtsug bud lnga ba dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga ri rab @195b kyi rtse mo la btsugs te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las ldang te bla gos phrag ba gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas ba lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: joms ldan da ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba dud nas joms ldan da la di skad ces gsol to

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: joms ldan da

original: lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste /
analyzed: lha di dag ni mchod rten bgyid ba tshal ba sha stag ste

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na /
analyzed: khor gyi dkyil khor dir mchis na

original: ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa /
analyzed: ci nas tshangs ba bsod nams phel ba dang lha dang cha ba

original: bdud dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bdud dang cha ba

original: tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol /
analyzed: tshangs ba dang cha ba jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram zer cha ba skye dgu las dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge snyen dang dge snyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du phel ba gyur ba de lta de ltar joms ldan da kyis de dag la chos ston du gsol

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas joms ldan da kyis rten cing brel ba byung ba tshigs su gcod ba bka stsal ba

original: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'ana ta th'a ga to hya ba data /
analyzed: ye dharma he tu pra bha ba he tunte shana ta tha ga to hya ba data

original: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra mana /
analyzed: te shanytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam ba d ma ha shra mana

original: chos gang rgyu byung de dag gi /
analyzed: chos gang rgyu byung de dag gi

original: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang //
analyzed: rgyu dang de gog gang yin ba

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba bka stsal te

original: dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs //
analyzed: dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: di lta ste

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te /
analyzed: rten cing brel ba byung ba di ni de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te

original: sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: sus rten cing brel ba byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs ba mthong ngo

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu

original: rigs kyi bu @196a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu

original: mdo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam /
analyzed: mdo dad ba can gang la la jig gis mi gnas ba phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra bru tsam

original: srog shing ni khab tsam /
analyzed: srog shing ni khab tsam

original: gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la /
analyzed: gdugs ni ba ku la me tog tsam jig byed la

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na de tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rten cing brel ba byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su gcod ba nang du jug na de tshangs ba bsod nams skyed ba gyur te

original: 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: di nas chi pho shing chi ba dus byed nas tshangs ba jig rten dag tu skye ba gyur ro

original: de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas chi pho te chi ba dus byed nas gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam ba skye ba gyur ro

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag /
analyzed: joms ldan da kyis de skad ces bka stsal nas nyan thos de dag dang byang chub sems dpa de dag dang thams cad dang ldan ba khor de dag

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar cha ba jig rten yi rangs te

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: joms ldan da kyis gsungs ba mngon ba bstod do

analyzed: phag ba rten cing brel ba byung ba zhes byed ba theg ba chen po mdo rdzogs so

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang zhus chen gyi lo tsa bande ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la bebs ba
